title: Add min and max document options to global ordinal join
description: This feature allows to only match "to" documents that have at least between min and max matching  "from" documents.

comments.author: Martijn van Groningen
comments.content: Added a patch that adds the min/max feature to the global ordinal join.

comments.author: Adrien Grand
comments.content: +1 Let's just make it explicit that the min/max parameters are included?

comments.content: makes sense, I'll update the jdocs.
